Judul: Visual Culture and Personality Psychological Security
Abstrak:
The  process  of  advertising  effects  via  its   visual  practices  on  psychological  security  of  personality  is  complex  and contradicting. The study involving two hundred respondents was carried out in three Russian cities (Moscow, Yekaterinburg and Krasnoyarsk). It identified destructive  factors of 
advertising presenting the greater danger to psychological security of personality are indicated.
Kata Kunci: visual culture, everyday life, psychological security. advertising, effects techniques.
